His role model is Madhesh Krishnaswamy (Ravi Prakash), a world renowned wildlife photographer and his dream is to be an assistant to this arrogant man. Karthik hangs out with his friends and is extremely close to Sundar (Sundar) who introduces his girlfriend Yamini (Richa) to the gang. Karthik (Dhanush) is a lensman for whom life lies in his camera. His ambition has no bounds. He wants to excel in his chosen profession and dreams of becoming a wildlife photographer. A secluded individual, Karthik's only company is Sundar (Sundar) and co. Sundar introduces him to Yamini (Richa Gangopadhyaya), his girl friend. As it happens, the two with contrasting characters end up quarrelling all time. Sparks fly high only to settle down and romance suddenly blossoms between the two.::Harishankar

Karthik is an ambitious person, passionate about photography. He lives with his friends and leads a typical Chennai bachelor life. He is particularly close to one of his friends who introduces his girlfriend to him. They were initially absolutely hating of each other, only to settle down due to opposites attracting. Their life after marriage, particularly influenced by the ups and downs in Karthik's lens profession, is the main subject of the movie.::StraightDrive
